original_text: There was an entrance in the wall opposite the doors of the inside row of rooms. There was also an entrance at the east end of the path between the rows of rooms.
korean_text: 이 남쪽 방에 출입하는 문이 있는데 담 동쪽 길 어귀에 있더라

sentences.original_text: There was an entrance in the wall
opposite the doors of the inside row of rooms
sentences.korean_translation: 안쪽 방들의 문들과 마주보는 곳에 있었다

sentences.original_text: at the east end of the path
